physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: LOOKUP( SPARSE %1,  CAST (%2 AS VARCHAR ( 38 )),  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3), %2)
LOOKUP( SPARSE %1,  CAST (%2 AS VARCHAR ( 38 )),  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3), %2)
LOOKUP( SPARSE %1,  CAST (%2 AS VARCHAR ( 16 )),  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3), %2)
LOOKUP( SPARSE %1,  CAST (%2 AS VARCHAR ( 16 )),  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3), %2)
CASE  WHEN  EXTRACT( YEAR  FROM %1) = '4712' AND  EXTRACT( MONTH  FROM %1) = '12' AND  DAYOFMONTH(%1) = '31' THEN  NULL  ELSE %1 END
CASE  WHEN  EXTRACT( YEAR  FROM %1) = '1901' AND  EXTRACT( MONTH  FROM %1) = '01' AND  DAYOFMONTH(%1) = '01' THEN  NULL  ELSE %1 END
LOOKUP( SPARSE %1,  CAST (%2 AS VARCHAR ( 38 )),  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3), %2)
LOOKUP( SPARSE %1,  CAST (%2 AS VARCHAR ( 38 )),  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3), %2)
LOOKUP( SPARSE %1,  CAST (%2 AS VARCHAR ( 38 )), %2,  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3))

LOOKUP( SPARSE %1,  CAST (%2 AS VARCHAR ( 38 )), %2,  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3))
